blogPost.excerpt: A digital dashboard to concisely track the fulfillment of President Biden's promises for the first 100 days.
blogPost.body: A digital dashboard to concisely track the fulfillment of President Biden's promises for the first 100 days.
blogPost.title: Track Biden - Track Biden's first 100 Days
blogPost.author: Amr Sobhy

localize.description: 一个数字仪表盘，简明扼要地跟踪拜登总统前100天的承诺履行情况。
一個數字儀表盤，簡明扼要地跟蹤拜登總統前100天的承諾履行情況。

previous.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
previous.title: Creact - Daily art & drawing challenges to improve your art skills

localize.description: 通过每天的艺术挑战来扩展你作为一个艺术家的技能。类别包括绘画、摄影、绘画和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天练习。通过Creact！挑战你和你的朋友，每天创造新的东西。
localize.tagline: 每天的艺术和绘画挑战，提高你的艺术技能。

localize.description: 通過每天的藝術挑戰來擴展你作爲一個藝術家的技能。類別包括繪畫、攝影、繪畫和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天練習。通過Creact！挑戰你和你的朋友，每天創造新的東西。
localize.tagline: 每天的藝術和繪畫挑戰，提高你的藝術技能。

next.excerpt: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
next.title: Mibo - Videoconferencing that feels like real life

localize.description: Mibo是为非正式会议、远程酒会、社交聚会、网络活动或只是与你的团队一起闲逛而设计的视频聊天软件。在Mibo中，您可以决定加入什么对话和在哪里闲逛。Mibo感觉就像在一起。就像现实生活一样。
localize.tagline: 宛如真实生活的视频会议

localize.description: Mibo是爲非正式會議、遠程酒會、社交聚會、網絡活動或只是與你的團隊一起閒逛而設計的視頻聊天軟件。在Mibo中，您可以決定加入什麼對話和在哪裏閒逛。Mibo感覺就像在一起。就像現實生活一樣。
localize.tagline: 宛如真實生活的視頻會議
